programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: Django, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Um pistoleiro carregando um caixão, entra em uma cidade que tem duas facções em guerra, o KKK e uma gangue de bandidos mexicanos. Esse é Django e ele se envolve em uma luta contra os dois lados.

programme.title: A Vingança de um Pistoleiro, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Três vaqueiros, cavalgam rumo a suas casas cortando o indomável solo do velho oeste quando encontram uma cabana onde está o bando liderado por Blind Dick, e decidem acampar por ali.

programme.title: O Céu Mandou Alguém, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Após mais um assalto, três ladrões de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.title: Um Homem Dificil de Matar, (2003, Western)
programme.desc: Na fase final do Velho Oeste, um grupo de cowboys liderado por Monte enfrenta o envelhecimento e a falta de oportunidade oriunda do desuso de sua profissão.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Que Assim Seja, Trinity, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Um aventureiro protege um garoto que herdou um terreno sob o qual há um rico campo de petróleo. O menino é ameaçado por vilões perigosos que querem prejudicá-lo e tomar a terra.

programme.title: Gringo, Reze para Morrer, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: À frente de uma dúzia de bandidos, dois irmãos mantêm a pequena cidade de White City sob controle. Finalmente, porém, um caçador de recompensas, com a ajuda de um aleijado, tenta libertar White City de seus ferozes opressores.

programme.title: Teia De Crimes, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell está se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada até que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, é misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato não resolvido e encontra semelhanças do crime em um livro do artista polonês Krystov Kozlow. Ele começa a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio a uma catástrofe biológica que ameaça destruir a raça humana, as histórias de três casais se cruzam quando eles são forçados a tomar decisões difíceis que definirão seu futuro.

programme.title: A Batalha de Shindisi, (2019, War Drama)
programme.desc: A história do filme é baseada em eventos reais que ocorreram durante a intervenção militar russa na Geórgia em 2008.

programme.title: Tempestade de Gelo, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma tempestade de inverno atinge a Carolina do Norte com a menor temperatura já registrada na história, os climatologistas começam uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar o máximo de vidas possíveis antes que o país inteiro vire gelo.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporção ameaça destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extinção.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de você, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradáveis que indicam que algo está errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, há manchas em sua pele e ele tem visões que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da ficção.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos é contratado para recuperar uma fita de vídeo. À medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vídeo certo, eles se deparam com um número aparentemente interminável de vídeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o último.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Nazistas no Centro da Terra, (2012, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Pesquisadores na Antártica são sequestrados por uma equipe de tropas mascaradas. Eles são arrastados no subsolo para um continente escondido no centro da terra.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: O Tetsusaiga atingiu o poder das escamas de dragão. A fim de poder usar rapidamente o poder demoníaco, Inuyasha não tem escolha a não ser passar por treinamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Koga chegam ao local da luta de Moryomaru e Naraku. Mas Moryomaru, que quer seus cacos de Shikon, pega Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo foi contaminado pela teia de aranha de Naraku. Para salvá-la, Inuyasha e Kagome precisam da corda do arco no mausoléu do Monte Azusa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo tenta purificar Naraku e seus fragmentos de Shikon. Ela também tenta purificar a vontade de Midoriko que controla os cacos nas pernas de Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru pergunta a sua mãe como ele pode expandir o Meido de Tenseiga, o caminho para o submundo. Em resposta, sua mãe usa a pedra Meido que o pai de Sesshoumaru lhe deu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Príncipe das Flores é um demônio que se alimenta de corações tristes ou angustiados. Deslumbrado pela fragrância da flor, Inuyasha está envolvido em um sonho falso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Espelho Demoníaco rouba a energia demoníaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demoníaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A fim de derrotar os demônios, Sango reveste Hiraikotsu com veneno. Para purificá-lo do veneno, o Mestre das Poções diz que ela deve derrotar o demônio dentro do jarro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: OS Sentimentos de Sango, A Decisão de Mirok

programme.title: Shishinki, o Ogre da Morte, aparece diante de Sesshomaru, dizendo a ele que Inuyasha e o pai de Sesshoumaru roubaram seu Meido Zangetsuha em uma batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trás do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele irá superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego à espada, bem como seu ódio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrança de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demoníaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mãos de Naraku. Mas ela volta à vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Então, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que está bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome está preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admissão, então ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a má vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas é apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku está atrás do último fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refém.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: O Momento da Joia Ficar Completa

programme.title: Kagome se forma no ensino médio e retorna à era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O coração de Inuyasha é devorado pelo veneno da Jóia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demoníaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escuridão em seu coração toma conta dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome são restaurados e a luz divina é revivida na Jóia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demônio apesar de ter um coração humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poço do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu último desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mãos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Quando a última pessoa a obter a Jóia Shikon faz o único desejo correto, a jóia será purificada e desaparecerá inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Anos após ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai é acordado por uma garota do ensino médio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poço Come-Ossos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Garota que Volta no Tempo e o Garoto Lacrado

programme.title: Concedido o poder de controlar Inuyasha, Agome descobre que ela pode ser a reencarnação da irmã mais velha de Kaede, Kikyo, que selou Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: As Pessoas Atrás da Joia de Quatro Almas

programme.title: Agome e Inuyasha precisam das habilidades do outro para reunir os fragmentos dispersos da Jóia de Quatro Almas, mas os dois não se dão bem.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Volta Através do Poço Come-Ossos

programme.title: De volta ao presente, Agome está relaxando em casa quando Inuyasha vem procurá-la, e ela retorna com ele ao passado para encontrar Yura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O meio irmão de Inuyasha, Sesshomaru, aparece procurando pelo túmulo de seu pai que era um youkai-cachorro. Agome aprende sobre o passado de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Apesar da ajuda de Agome em frustrá-lo, Sesshomaru descobre a localização do túmulo do pai de Inuyasha, que contém uma espada que ele deseja.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Tessaiga, O Canino de Aço Destruidor

programme.title: Agome é capaz de puxar a espada Tessaiga para fora do altar, e Sesshomaru tenta matá-la, irritando Inuyasha e provocando um duelo de irmãos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Agome encontram um jovem samurai chamado Nobunaga cujo senhor foi possuído por um youkai Sapo, e eles partiram para resgatar uma princesa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Senhor Feudal Youkai, Sapo Tsukumo

programme.title: Em sua jornada, Inuyasha e Agome encontram Shippo, um jovem youkai raposa que rouba um pedaço da Jóia para vingar seu pai assassinado.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Entra em Cena Shippo! Os Irmãos Youkai Relâmpago

programme.title: Inuyasha duela com Hiten enquanto Shippo tenta usar sua magia para resgatar Agome de Manten, mas os Irmãos Relâmpago não serão derrotados tão facilmente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Confrontro Fantasma: Irmãos Relâmpago vs. Tessaiga

programme.title: Quando Agome retorna ao presente, o poder da Jóia de Quatro Almas incita uma antiga máscara de noh para atacar seu avô.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Máscara de Maldição que Ressuscita na Época Atual

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke reluta, mas tenta convencer o pai a voltar para casa. Joseph causa todo tipo de problema e diz que um usuário de Stand está por perto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Hazamada estão felizes de visitar a casa do famoso artista de mangá Rohan Kishibe, mas logo se assustam com ele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 1

programme.title: Rohan diz que Koichi o inspira a criar um mangá. Quando ele está prestes a aproveitar Koichi para sua arte, alguém bate à porta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro pede ajuda a Josuke para caçar um rato que consegue usar um Stand. Depois, eles encontram algo bizarro no canal de irrigação onde o rato foi visto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yukako vai a uma estética para dar um trato no visual e atrair Koichi. O plano dá certo, mas o efeito dura só meia hora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.title: Sem querer, Shigechi pega a marmita de Yoshikage Kira, que tenta recuperá-la antes que seu segredo seja revelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 1

programme.title: Shigechi consegue fugir de Kira. Gravemente ferido, ele tenta ir até Josuke para ser curado e avisá-lo que Kira é uma ameaça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Determinado a ingressar na máfia, Giorno vai à prisão falar com Polpo, um dos principais membros da Passione, e recebe um teste de iniciação impossível.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Conheça o gângster atrás do muro

programme.title: Giorno luta contra o Stand de Polpo, que pode se movimentar livremente pelas sombras. Koichi conta a Giorno sobre a flecha que produz um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando a notícia do tesouro escondido de Polpo se espalha entre os membros da Passione, Bucciarati e seu bando partem para pegá-lo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Em busca da fortuna de Polpo!

programme.title: Com o desaparecimento misterioso da tripulação de Bucciarati no convés, Abbacchio lança seu Stand, Moody Jazz, para investigar esse preocupante fenômeno.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Dummie A Múmia e a Tumba de Achnetut, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Dummie está com saudades de casa e quer ir para casa visitar o túmulo de seus pais.

programme.title: Trenk - O Cavaleiro Trapalhão, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Trenk, de dez anos, camponês e propriedade do malvado Sir Wertolt, quer se tornar um cavaleiro e libertar sua família. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do dragão do ducado e é nomeado cavaleiro pelo duque.

programme.title: As Travessuras de Uma Sereia, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um projeto de propriedade de Xuan envolvendo a recuperação do mar ameaça a subsistência das sereias que dependem do mar para sobreviver. A sereia Shan é enviada para parar Xuan e levá-lo para que faça projeto em outro local.

programme.title: Thor e o Fantasma Voador, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após a guerra, o Fantasma Voador persegue moradores. Tom, Mirjam e Sniff investigam. Com as habilidades de Sniff, o fantasma é preso e uma trama de assassinato e vingança é descoberta.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: O Caçador de Dragões, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que o pai de Will é morto por um dragão, ele embarca em uma jornada épica para se vingar do monstro .

programme.title: Dummie A Múmia e a Tumba de Achnetut, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Dummie está com saudades de casa e quer ir para casa visitar o túmulo de seus pais.

programme.title: Trenk - O Cavaleiro Trapalhão, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Trenk, de dez anos, camponês e propriedade do malvado Sir Wertolt, quer se tornar um cavaleiro e libertar sua família. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do dragão do ducado e é nomeado cavaleiro pelo duque.

programme.title: As Travessuras de Uma Sereia, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um projeto de propriedade de Xuan envolvendo a recuperação do mar ameaça a subsistência das sereias que dependem do mar para sobreviver. A sereia Shan é enviada para parar Xuan e levá-lo para que faça projeto em outro local.

programme.title: Thor e o Fantasma Voador, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após a guerra, o Fantasma Voador persegue moradores. Tom, Mirjam e Sniff investigam. Com as habilidades de Sniff, o fantasma é preso e uma trama de assassinato e vingança é descoberta.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)

programme.title: Scared Stiff, (1953, Comedy)

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Drama)

programme.desc: Federal agent Richard Chance has a score to settle, and he's through playing by the rules. He vows to take down a murderous counterfeiter by any means necessary. But as the stakes grow higher, will Chance's obsession ultimately destroy him?

programme.desc: Using his uncanny ability to get inside psychopaths' minds, former FBI agent, Will Graham, returns to action to hunt down a serial killer.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii, (1961, Musical)

programme.title: The World of Henry Orient, (1964, Comedy)

programme.title: Death On The Nile, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.desc: Series of short, highly irreverent, and quite often tasteless skits.

programme.title: Bad News Bears in Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Bad News Bears Go To Japan, (1978, Comedy)

programme.title: Meatballs, (1978, Comedy)

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)

programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)

programme.title: Lenny, (1974, Comedy)

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.

programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time Limit Closes in! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can't be refused!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!

programme.title: Sanji's dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom's crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To My Buds! Sanji's Farewell Note!

programme.title: There's only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend's disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Let's Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!

programme.title: Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he'll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin'emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks' thirst for revenge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!

programme.title: The samurai have landed! And they make their way into the country of Zou unaware of the welcome they will receive by the Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai!

programme.title: Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!

programme.title: The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!

programme.title: The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!

programme.title: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy's response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!

programme.title: Dogstorm and Cat Viper share their story of being on the journey with Oden and Roger but are interrupted by Nami who is concerned about the sea route. Meanwhile, Jack is plotting to bring down the Mokomo Dukedom again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Journey! The Dog and the Cat and the Pirate King!

programme.title: The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: After being aggressively attacked by Jack's fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!

programme.title: With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant's wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat's Rescue Operation!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy's team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy's team sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji! But they didn't realize there is one more crewmember than they have bargained for!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Princess Vivi and Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: Carrot stows away! And settles in with the Straw Hats as they make their way to rescue Sanji! Meanwhile, in the Sakura Kingdom, Dalton and Kureha are getting ready for the Reverie so as their former enemy in his newly-built kingdom…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Rebecca and the Sakura Kingdom!

programme.title: News of the raid on the Revolutionary Army reaches Luffy! But that's the least of their worries as they face a storm and a sudden lack of provisions! Meanwhile, Emperor Kaido fumes with anger at the reckless generation of upstarts!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Returns! An Imminent Threat to the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Sneaking in to the Navy island facility to replenish their food supply, Luffy and the others risk being caught out in the open! Will their infamy make them easy to spot by the hotheaded Navy recruits around them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hungry Front! Luffy and the Navy Rookies!

programme.title: The jig is up as Luffy and the others make a daring dash to avoid the furious Navy! Can they escape without having to turn to fight - and after they've had a chance to raid the cabinets for food?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Implacable Three! A Big Chase After the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Making a mad dash for the Submerge with the food they stole, Luffy and the others have to get through some of the Navy's upstart soldiers! Grount, whose arm holds incredible power, summons his training to challenge Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Fist! A Show Down! Luffy vs. Grount!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue to suffer from blazing heat and a perilous food crisis! As the seas finally calm, fishing is their only hope! Meanwhile, Sanji arrives in Big Mom's territory and keeps his cool - until he sees his bride-to-be!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji's Homecoming! Into Big Mom's Territory!

programme.title: Luffy is in danger as the venomous fish poison courses through his body! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a mysterious ship for help - a ship that bears a truly surprising crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: On the edge of life and death, Luffy's only hope rests with Sanji's siblings! But even though they refuse to share an antidote, they may be able to save Luffy's life yet, giving him enough energy to plunge right back into trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Poison Crisis! Luffy and Reiju!

programme.title: Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!

programme.title: The Straw Hats confront Pudding - the fiancée of Sanji! But when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer shocks them! Meanwhile, an ominous and mysterious message may spell doom for the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Daughter! Sanji's fiancée - Pudding!

programme.title: The dangerous waters around the Whole Cake Island harbor terrifying creatures that pose a challenge for the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Mama slips into a bout of her sickness and ravages her own land in search of a specific pastry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Massive Attack! Mom's Hunger Pangs!

programme.title: Big Mom rampages through the Whole Cake Island in search for sweets - but when the kitchen can't prepare them fast enough, her own son steps in to curb the carnage, with deadly results.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital City Falls?! Big Mom and Jimbei!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsène Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man…
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsène Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure…

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Skinwalkers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: A 12-year-old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

programme.title: Underworld, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: In the Underworld, Vampires are a secret clan of modern aristocratic sophisticates whose mortal enemies are the Lycans (werewolves), a shrewd gang of street thugs who prowl the city's underbelly.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution, (2006, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Vampire death dealer, Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

programme.title: Underworld Awakening, (2011, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrioress Selene leads the battle against humankind.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars, (2016, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: As the war between the Death Dealers and the Lycans rages on, Selene (Beckinsale), the vampire warrior, and Michael (Speedman), the werewolf hybrid, work together in an effort to unlock the secrets of their respective bloodlines.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned- revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Call Of The Canyon, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry leads cattlemen in rebellion when a packing company rep cheats them. A gal’s future depends on the company's radio spots for her show! It gets exciting when the owner appears incognito.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter, (1964, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Along Came A Spider, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: After the harrowing death of his partner, detective and best-selling author Alex Cross has retreated to the peace of retirement. But when a brilliant criminal (Michael Wincott) kidnaps a senator’s young daughter, Alex is lured back into action.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Along Came A Spider, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: After the harrowing death of his partner, detective and best-selling author Alex Cross has retreated to the peace of retirement. But when a brilliant criminal (Michael Wincott) kidnaps a senator’s young daughter, Alex is lured back into action.

programme.title: Panic Room, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: When her home is invaded by three armed robbers, a divorced woman and her young daughter hide in their specially designed panic room but end up in a deadly cat-and-mouse game anyway.

programme.title: The group must defend Alexandria from a threatening outside force.

programme.title: Michonne takes Virgil back to his mysterious island to reunite with his family; in exchange, Virgil promises weapons that could change the tide of the Whisperer War.

programme.title: With Negan's help, Alpha and the Whisperers attack Hilltop.

programme.title: Heroes and villains reckon with the aftermath of the Hilltop fire; Eugene takes a group on a journey to meet Stephanie, with the hopes of befriending another civilization.

programme.title: The communities prepare for the final battle of the Whisperer War; meanwhile, Eugene's group encounters Princess.

programme.title: Beta engages the final battle of the Whisperer War.

programme.title: Maggie returns, to the dismay of Negan; the trials she endured since leaving have made her harder in order for her and her son to survive; Daryl and Maggie unexpectedly fight an unseen and unknown threat.

programme.title: Daryl and Carol find an old cabin that takes Daryl back to his years away from the group after Rick disappeared; he relives the painful memory of meeting a reticent survivor and the toxic events that amplified his relationship with Dog.

programme.title: With Maggie's map, Gabriel and Aaron search for food and supplies to bring back to Alexandria; checking out one more location, they chance upon a stash; faith is broken and optimism is fragmented when they are put to the ultimate test.

programme.title: With Maggie back at Alexandria, Carol takes Negan on a journey to minimize the increasing tension; here, Negan reflects on his late wife, Lucille, and the events that led him to this point.

programme.title: Rick desperately tries to escape the CRM, but his hope fades with every failed escape attempt; he is forced to find his way in this new world and risks losing himself in the process.

programme.title: Michonne finds unexpected help on her search for Rick.

programme.title: Rick and Michonne must find a way to survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The school test results are posted, and Ami is at the top of her class. She finds herself becoming isolated after rumors that she cheated on the test.
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Illusion: Ami All Alone

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After being out sick, Chibi-Usa returns to school eager to see her friends. But to her surprise, her friends and teachers begin attacking her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Gate Is Completed? The Targeted Elementary School

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa decides to return to save her mother. With support from the Sailor Guardians and Tuxedo Mask, she opens the Door of Space and Time.
programme.sub-title: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Arriving in the future, the Sailor Guardians stand in shock as they see the ruins of what used to be Crystal Tokyo.
programme.sub-title: The Shocking Future: Dimande's Dark Ambition

programme.title: Sailor Moon
